item.title: Distributional regression: CRPS-error bounds for model fitting, model selection and convex aggregation
item.description: This paper provides the first statistical learning guarantees for distributional regression using CRPS, offering concentration bounds for model fitting, selection, and convex aggregation, applicable t…
